Class PhotosResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.juneau.rest.RestServlet
          • org.apache.juneau.rest.BasicRestServlet
            • org.apache.juneau.examples.rest.petstore.rest.PhotosResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, BasicRestConfig

    @RestResource(path="/photos",
              messages="nls/PhotosResource",
              title="Photo REST service",
              description="Sample resource that allows images to be uploaded and retrieved.",
              htmldoc=,
              properties=@Property(name="HtmlSerializer.uriAnchorText.s",value="SERVLET_RELATIVE"),
              swagger=)
public class PhotosResource
extends BasicRestServlet
    Sample resource that allows images to be uploaded and retrieved.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
